<title level="1" right="Focus 7" pfs="Standard">[Litany of Depravity](/Spells.aspx?ID=734)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
<trait label="Evil" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=64" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Litany" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=102" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 228 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 good creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 round
</row>

</column>

---

Your litany calls into question the morals your foe claims to hold dear. The target gains weakness 7 to evil, then becomes temporarily immune to all your litanies for 1 minute.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The weakness increases by 1.
name: Litany of Depravity
